item.title: How to include intro module into your website
item.description: Have you ever wondered how you can explain about your website to the users? If you have complicated UI or if there are lots of things to do in your webpage then, there is possibility that user might get lost. Best method to tackle this is to include simple intro tour which can guide users Are you wondering how Ok letâ€™s begin, You can achieve this by Intro.js Intro.js is open-source and free to use.
